transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji madam.
Customer: Haan. Hello.
Executive: Haan ji boliye madam.
Customer: Ji Pawan ji baat kar rahe hain all in one solution card by okay okay sir.
Executive: Haan wahi wahi bol rahe the sir haan ji boliye.
Executive: Namaskar sir main Priyanka baat kar rahi hoon IndiaMART ki team se sir recorded line pe namaskar.
Customer: Dhanyavad.
Executive: Aapka ek concern sir ji ji.
Executive: Ji aapka ek concern hamare paas open hua tha Aryan ji ki baat hui hogi sir concern resolve hai sir koi cheez pending hai aapne customer care pe call kiya tha hume.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: To ab jo bhi concern tha Aryan ji ke update mein hume ye bataya sir ki aap kisi buyer ke liye kuch enquire kar rahe the jo unhone dekh ke aapko bata diya.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan haan to abhi wo concern aapka close hai sir to main close kar doon yahan se wo update bhi main close karti hoon aapko.
Customer: Ho gaya.
Executive: Kuch aur information sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi sahi hai na ho gaya hai.
Executive: Okay rest aapka ye bhi tha sir ispe hamari baat bhi chal rahi package ko leke.
Customer: Package ko leke tha baki hum wahi keh rahe the unko ki 30000 tak ka wo karne ke liye to abhi to hamara hai nahi agar thoda sa wo bhi ho jayega payment ka ho jayega to fir hum dekhte hain karte hain.
Executive: 30000 mein 30000 mein kaise sir.
Customer: Maine bola tha ki 30000 tak ka jaise 34000 sir bol rahe the humne bola ki kuch offer wagera nikalwa ke agar ho sakta hai to hum 30000 pay kar denge aur bhi aur ise one year ke liye wo kar dijiye aur mere paas chalte jo aapka TrustSeal hai wo TrustSeal ka wo karwa dijiye.
Executive: TrustSeal one year mein hum aapka ye jo aap ye keh rahe hain amount adjust karke usko 30000 mein kar de.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Sir isme na main abhi wahi jaise aapne mujhe bataya main check hi kar rahi thi ki kya proposal aapke sath shared hai.
Executive: Ab wahi hai na sir jo bhi amount final tha Aryan ji ne to aapko de diya jitna paisa adjust hota hai sir wo day wise adjust hota hai.
Customer: Sahi baat hai.
Executive: Ab maan lijiye aap aaj usko adjust na karke ek mahine baad adjust karenge to mere paas bacha hua jo paisa hai wo ek mahina kam ho gaya to main paisa kam adjust karungi amount aur increase hi hoga wo kam nahi hoga sir.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Hum to bache hue din ka paisa adjust karte hain na aap jitna jaldi karenge utna jyada paisa hamare paas hoga adjust karne ke liye.
Executive: Isme kahan par problem hai amount aapko jyada lag raha hai sir.
Customer: Haan thoda sa amount hai isme.
Executive: Ab fees karenge sir wo to 34 bhi ho hi jayega uski to khair kya dikkat hai.
Executive: Kuch aur agar koi aur agar confusion hai sir koi aur cheez hai aap batao.
Customer: Nahi abhi to amount ka hi tha amount ka hi hum bol rahe the.
Executive: To ye amount pe aap payment karna chah rahe hain.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ab payment kab tak ho sakte hai sir.
Customer: Payment ab thoda sa a jaye payment aa jaye to hum iske baad karenge isse confirmation karenge.
Executive: Matlab main na payment ka hi wait kar loon.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Achcha achcha kab tak expected hai sir payment.
Customer: Yahi isi month tak mein matlab is month bole to ab ye December ke idhar.
Executive: December mein bol rahe hain aap.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To December mein aap keh rahe hain 30000 kara dena hold kar lo.
Customer: Haan agar ho sakta ho to.
Executive: Nahi sir nahi recorded line se baat kar rahi hoon sir aur aapke account manager to Aryan ji hain main aapko yehi confirm kar de rahi hoon sir ye jo hamare prices chalte hain hum cut to cut baat karte hain kuch aisa rakha nahi rehta alag se jo price hai ye bacha hua amount hai puri calculation aapko performa hum share karte hain sir proposal share karte hain usme puri calculation aapko likhi hui aati hai ki hamare product ka ye price hai aapka itna paisa bacha tha ye minus karke itna price hai ye hamara discount hai usme further kyuki aap hamare sath continue kar rahe ho aur ye offer hai itni buyleads hain total payable amount aapka ye hai aur aage payment mode rehte hain agar aap okay karte hain to wo modes aap usse pay kar sakte hain isme kuch aisa chhupa hua nahi hai sir jo aapke paas aayega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To ise hum abhi nahi kar sakte sir continue aage jaake to amount aur badhega hi kam to nahi hoga aur ye 30000 ka amount valid nahi hai sir.
Customer: Chalo ja aage upar lage aage.
Customer: Chaliye koi dikkat nahi fir hum karte hain fir iska hai na.
Executive: Chaliye iske liye sir aapse karte hain fir hum ek baar dobara connect karte hain ek se do din mein shayad aap isko kar paye November end mein.
Customer: 80 lete hain aap 70 hi de dijiye.
Executive: Kya kar sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Are ye wala haan hello haan.
Executive: Chalo theek hai sir aap bhi shayad busy hain main aapko dobara ek se do din mein connect karungi iske liye but rest abhi ye concern aapka close kar doon na sir.
Customer: Haan haan kar dijiye close kar dijiye sir.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: 10 aur le lijiyega.
Executive: Haan hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to pay ₹30,000 for TrustSeal.

- Wants to adjust the amount for TrustSeal.



Resolution:

- Explained the amount adjustment process.

- Executive will connect in 1-2 days.

- Closed the customer's concern.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will connect in 1-2 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, payment, amount, subscription
